reasoning.step2:
GrandTotal.Amount (21.26)
- Confidence: 95%
- Evidence: "zu erstattender Betrag" column shows 21,26 EUR at bottom; matches internal note. Clear numeric total with currency context.
- Uncertainty: comma used as decimal separator; interpretation as 21.26 is standard.

Invoice.Date ("25.01.2024")
- Confidence: 99%
- Evidence: "Rechnungsdatum: 25.01.2024" appears twice on the page.
- Uncertainty: none significant.

Sender.VatId ("ATU67782722")
- Confidence: 98%
- Evidence: Footer shows "VAT/UID-Nr: ATU67782722" clearly identifying sender VAT.
- Uncertainty: small OCR risk but characters are clear.

Vat.Rate (10)
- Confidence: 95%
- Evidence: Line item Ust% shows "10 %" and VAT % column at summary shows "10 %".
- Uncertainty: none significant; rule requires removing % symbol.

Net.Amount (19.33)
- Confidence: 96%
- Evidence: Nettobetrag for the line item shows 19,33 and summary shows "Netto 19,33" corresponding to net amount.
- Uncertainty: decimal comma interpreted as period.

Vat.Amount (1.93)
- Confidence: 96%
- Evidence: Summary shows Ust amount 1,93 corresponding to 10% of 19,33 and summed to 21,26.
- Uncertainty: minor OCR/rounding risk but arithmetic consistent.
